item.title: Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”! New York Comic Con Booth So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile …

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”!

New York Comic Con Booth

So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile Company at their booth, #1419! You’ll be able to preview the latest Nendoroid, POP UP PARADE, and figma sculpts. This is a must-see for anyone interested in collecting figures of all shapes, sizes, and types of various characters from their favorite anime and video games.

HELLO! GOOD SMILE: Hatsune Miku

And for the Vocaloid enthusiasts like ourselves, we’re happy to say the adorable Hatsune Miku is going to be released as a part of the HELLO! GOOD SMILE line in a special ice cream-themed display! You’ll also get the opportunity to take home a special HELLO! GOOD SMILE themed keychain.

NYCC 2021 Exclusive

Additionally, Good Smile Company will have a limited quantity of special Naruto Nendoroid Pin (Black & White Version) available for purchase!

Other character goods from series such as Cardcaptor Sakura, Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, and My Hero Academia are also going to be available, alongside merchandise from For Fans By Fans. Make sure to take a look while supplies last!

This year, New York Comic Con will run from October 7-10, 2021, at the Jarvis Center.
For tickets, check out https://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/ !

Good Smile Company Links

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Youtube

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.

The post Brand New “Kagerou Project” Products Available in Shops Now! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Today’s announcement on Twitter comes from the guys at A3 CharaCharge where they have informed customers of the availability regarding new “Kagerou Project” products and merchandise.

å…¨å›½ã®ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒ—(ä¸€éƒ¨åº—èˆ—ãƒ»ã‚ªãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚’é™¤ã)ã«ã¦ã€ã‚«ã‚²ãƒ­ã‚¦ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã€‘ã®æ–°å•†å“ãŒã”äºˆç´„å—ä»˜ä¸­ï¼ãŠè¿‘ãã®ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚ˆã‚Šãœã²ã”äºˆç´„ãã ã•ã„ï¼é€šè²©ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼â‡’https://t.co/JFbylPwGsFã€€#ã‚«ã‚²ãƒ—ãƒ­ pic.twitter.com/YcDqtBAVjw

— æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾A3 (@A3_CharaCharge) February 20, 2020

Kagerou Project products are now available for reservation at anime shops in Japan (excluding some stores and online) nationwide! Some of these include:

  • Acrylic Stand “Kagerou Project” 02 / Cat ver. in a Box (10 types) – 8,800 yen

  • Tin Badge “Kagerou Project” 05 / Cat ver. in a Box (10 types) – 5,280 yen

  • Small case (with ramune) “Kagerou Project” 01 / Cat Design ver. – 880 yen

And many, many more!

Check out some of the products available here.

Sources

A3 CharaCharge on Twitter

The post Brand New “Kagerou Project” Products Available in Shops Now! appeared first on VNN.

The post “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Early today, an announcement was made on the official Twitter account of Charaani and POP culture online store “Chara-ani.com” regarding the opening of pre-orders for the ” Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie.

ã€äºˆç´„é–‹å§‹ã€‘

é›ªãƒŸã‚¯2020 ã©ã§ã‹ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒœãµã‚ãµã‚ã¬ã„ãã‚‹ã¿

è©³ã—ãã¯â†’https://t.co/5w7H0raQzJã€€

ä»Šå¹´ã‚‚ç™»å ´ä¸‰æœˆå…«æ—¥ã•ã‚“ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ¡ãƒ‡ã‚¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ã©ã§ã‹ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒœãµã‚ãµã‚ã¬ã„ãã‚‹ã¿äºˆç´„é–‹å§‹#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #é›ªãƒŸã‚¯ #SNOWMIKU2020 #ã•ã£ã½ã‚é›ªã¾ã¤ã‚Š #hatsunemiku pic.twitter.com/O7Nn2a9ucT

— ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¢ãƒ‹ã€å…¬å¼ã€‘ (@charaani) February 17, 2020

With a scheduled release date for June 2020, the very cute Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020 plushie is available to pre-order on their official website for only 9,900 yen!

  • The reservation period lasts from February 17, 2020 12:00:00 JPT to February 27, 2020 23:59:00 JPT.
  • There’s a limit of 5 items per person
  • Payment methods include Credit Card / Cash on Store / BOOK â˜† WALKER ID payment & BitCash
Coming this year as well, Snow Miku will be featured as another stuffed animal with a “deformed” design. More news of her arrival will come on March 8, 2020.

Sources

Charaani Official Store

The post “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
A plushie of Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.Â has made its appearance in Gift ONLINE SHOP! The plush toy has been carefully designed to include all the fine details of her costume, so expect a high fidelity product when you purchase it! Be advised that you will have a limited amount of time to purchase …

The post “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A plushie of Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.Â has made its appearance in Gift ONLINE SHOP!

The plush toy has been carefully designed to include all the fine details of her costume, so expect a high fidelity product when you purchase it!

Be advised that you will have a limited amount of time to purchase this awesome plush of Hatsune Miku, keeping in mind this is a limited quantity product! We’ve got all the details below:

  • Pre-Order Dates: From February 14, 2020 @ 18:00 PM JPT on to February 25, 2020
  • Shipping Time: Scheduled to ship around mid-March 2020
  • Purchase Limit: 3 per person
  • Price: 4,400 yen (tax included)

“Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” is available here.

Make sure to get your plushie before it’s too late! Here at VNN we’re eager to see your comments regarding this cute Hatsune Miku toy!

Sources

Gift Online Shop on Twitter

The post “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary. Illustration The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the …

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary.

Illustration

The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the full illustration will be revealed soon!

Crowdfunding

The crowdfunding will begin on February 17th, 2020, at 17:00 and will close on April 19th, 2020, at 23:59 (times are in JST). There’s plenty of opportunity to gather up some money to help with the crowdfunding!

The crowdfunding itself will take place on the site “ACT NOW” – you will need to register an account. IfÂ  you’re interested in registering now, you can do so here!

If the goal amount is reached, Meiko will be unveiled at this years Magical Mirai 2020 and Kaito will be displayed at an official event in 2021. They also plan to have a life size statue of all 6 characters together. If the amount exceeds the goal, the crowdfunding will still be open and all extras will go towards future activities for Meiko and Kaito. Let’s try and get it as high as we can!

Rewards

Of course with every crowdfunding campaign, there are many cool items for our backers!

3000 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko and Kaito Clear File (one of each)
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)

15,115 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Meiko Sticker by iXima

15,217 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Kaito Sticker by iXima

30,000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Two Meiko Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

30, 000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Course Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito Course
  • Two Kaito Course Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Three Meiko Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Meiko HaigÅ (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Meiko HaigÅ

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Three Kaito Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Naoto FÅ«ga (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Naoto FÅ«ga

Feeling Course (Unlimited)

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Statue name

If you purchase a course that allows you to have your name on the statue along side another course, your name on the figure will be bigger depending on number of people who do so.

The product may differ from what you see on the picture.

Overseas shipment will not be accepted, it is recommended that you use a forwarding service if you wish to do so.

If all limited courses have been purchased, they may add extra during the crowdfunding campaign if there are enough request for more.

Twitter Hashtag

They will be having a dedicated Twitter hashtag that you may use for the event. The hashtag is #MK15th_projectÂ  and will be checked everyday in order to make it a community project!

 

Stay tuned to VNN for any update on this project!

Source: Piapro Blog

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
As we all know, Wonfes is always a big event for us Figure lovers. Not only is there a lot of figures to be seen, but there is definitely a lot of looking around to try and find all of them! Here at VNN, we try to help out with that. Of course, we are …

The post Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
As we all know, Wonfes is always a big event for us Figure lovers. Not only is there a lot of figures to be seen, but there is definitely a lot of looking around to try and find all of them! Here at VNN, we try to help out with that. Of course, we are bound to miss a few ourselves, so feel free to give us a heads up if we miss any!

Figures

Of course, there was a fair amount of scales, figmas, nendos and many more this year! Let’s take a look at some of them that we have found of our favourite virtual singers this year.

Of course, as is standard every year, there were tons of figures to see of our favourite virtual singers!

GoodSmile Racing

GSR is definitely a big part of Miku and wonfes, and of course, it’s a perfect place for them to showcase their cars as well!

We hope you enjoyed our run down of Wonfes 2020 and we look forward to seeing you at the next Wonfes!

If we have missed anything, let us know in the comments!

Photo Sources

Teto, A 1/8th scale figure of Racing Miku 2020, Racing Miku 2019 Thailand Ver., 1/7th scale figure Hatsune Miku: Kentaro Yabuki x osoba, Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2019 Ver, 1/8th scale figure Hatsune Miku: First Dream Ver., 1/7 MIKU EXPO Digital Stars 2020ver., Hatsune Miku BiCuteBunnies ver., Miku Prize Figures, figma Racing Miku: 2020 ver, figma of Sakura Miku, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2020, Nendoroid Doll of Hatsune Miku, Nendoroid of Snow Miku 2.0, Hatsune Miku V4X, Desktop Singer Series, Mini Figure Series, Rin and Len Tokyo Cartoony, Racing Miku 2013 Rd.4 SUGO

The post Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver. Pre-orders
item.dc:creator: ragyuo
item.description:
A new Miku figure has just opened for pre-orders and she is lovely! This time, the figure is “Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver.” and is a 1/8th scale. The figure is by Alphamax and the illustration was done by Ordan. Pre-orders CDJapan Price: 18,236 Yen You can pre-order the figure …

The post Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver. Pre-orders appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new Miku figure has just opened for pre-orders and she is lovely! This time, the figure is “Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver.” and is a 1/8th scale. The figure is by Alphamax and the illustration was done by Ordan.

Pre-orders

CDJapan

Price: 18,236 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on CD Japan here!

AmiAmi

Price: 19,230 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on AmiAmi here!

Hobby Search

Price: 17,860 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on Hobby Search here!

Alphamax

Price: 18,800 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on Alphamx here!

The figure is set to release in October 2020.

We are definitely excited to see this figure on release!

 

The post Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver. Pre-orders appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A new Hatsune Miku figure is now available for pre-order on Animate. The Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 ver. is a 1/8th scale figure and is set to release late February 2020 at a cost of 16,500 JPY.   The figure is based on the illustration ofÂ  “Miku Expo Digital Stars 2019 in Hong Kong” …

The post Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new Hatsune Miku figure is now available for pre-order on Animate. The Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 ver. is a 1/8th scale figure and is set to release late February 2020 at a cost of 16,500 JPY.

 

The figure is based on the illustration ofÂ  “Miku Expo Digital Stars 2019 in Hong Kong” which was illustrated by Tsurushima Tatsumi!

If you would like to pre-order yours, you can head on over to Animate here!

The post Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
If you didn’t know yet, both Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin: Winter Live Ver. Non Scale Figures are available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode. If you are like most of us and don’t live in Japan to get one, then now is your chance. The figure is described as the following; From Taito comes …

The post Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you didn’t know yet, both Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin: Winter Live Ver. Non Scale Figures are available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode. If you are like most of us and don’t live in Japan to get one, then now is your chance.

The figure is described as the following;

From Taito comes this affordable Prize Figure of Vocaloid Kagamine Len (Winter Live Ver.). He stands 7.1â€ on a white base in a winter marching band performance uniform as he readies his drumsticks before he takes a step and begins a beat. Bâ€™dum bâ€™dum Tss~. Highlights include the metallic gold paint of his outfit, his clearly painted smiling expression, and his 02 rosette.

The figure is currently available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode for $19.99 USD regular price or $18,99 USD under TOM Premium Price and it is set to release in February 2020. If you would like to pre-order the figure, you can head over to Tokyo Otaku Mode here!

In case you’ve missed it, you can also pre-order the Rin version for the same price on Tokyo Otaku Mode here! Rin is set to release in January 2020.

Rin’s version is described as;

Kagamine Rin holds her trumpet confidently as she marches along with one hand on her hip during a winter performance in her warm marching band outfit colored with metallic paint details. Measures 7.1â€.

Unfortunately, Miku’s version is currently out of stock, so you will need to look elsewhere to get her, but you can find her on Tokyo Otaku Mode Here!

If you do happen to get any of these, send us your photos! We would love to see them!

 

The post Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode appeared first on VNN.

item.title: HaiYi Echoes of the Sea Figure Revealed
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Quadimension has revealed a new figure for HaiYi “Echoes of the Sea”. At the moment, we only have her grey prototype version but she is still beautiful! The figure will be a 1/7th scale PVC/ABS figure and will be approximately 320mm in height including the base. Although we don’t have a price yet, her orders …

The post HaiYi Echoes of the Sea Figure Revealed appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Quadimension has revealed a new figure for HaiYi “Echoes of the Sea”. At the moment, we only have her grey prototype version but she is still beautiful!

The figure will be a 1/7th scale PVC/ABS figure and will be approximately 320mm in height including the base. Although we don’t have a price yet, her orders are set to open in December of this year and shipping will begin around the second half of 2020.

You can check out the video showcasing the figure on Bilibili here as well as see it on Weibo here!

Atlantis Song

Quadimension also mentioned that they will be remaking HaiYi’s song “Atlantis” !

To see the original Weibo post click here!

Update: Article correction from album to song

The post HaiYi Echoes of the Sea Figure Revealed appeared first on VNN.
